name: Pet Peeved
description:
My first ever Jam going solo, made in 3 Days for the ZenoJam

I did this as a distraction from all of my schoolwork, so I left the game fairly simple. Remember the controls is LMB to command your dog, and RMB or R to reset the game! Simply it's just destroying this room, I hope you have fun. 

(If I wasn't as busy, I would have loved to add a shop feature in the game, where you can buy different dogs. But maybe I'll save that idea for the future)

Thank you to everyone who has given every game developer the assets they need, to make the best games they can on OpenGameArt.com. I wish to give credit to every sound asset I used for this game:

"Monkey Island Band" by Eric Matyas Soundimage.org

"Cutie Pie by Francislee https://opengameart.org/users/francisleemusic

"Small SFX pack" by wobbleboxx.com

"Explosion SFX" by Dklon
